proper_latin.body:
*Ps 77:53*
Edúxit eos Dóminus in spe, allelúja: et inimícos eórum opéruit mare, allelúja, allelúja, allelúja.
*Ps 77:1*
Attendite, pópule meus, legem meam: inclináte aurem vestram in verba oris mei.
Glória Patri.
Edúxit eos Dóminus in spe, allelúja: et inimícos eórum opéruit mare, allelúja, allelúja, allelúja.
proper_latin.label: Introitus

proper_latin.body:
Omnípotens sempitérne Deus, qui paschále sacraméntum in reconciliatiónis humánæ fœ́dere contulísti: da méntibus nostris; ut, quod professióne celebrámus, imitémur efféctu.
Per Dominum...
proper_latin.label: Oratio

proper_latin.body:
Léctio Epístolæ beáti Petri Apóstoli.
*1 Petri 3:18-22*
Caríssimi: Christus semel pro peccátis nostris mórtuus est, justus pro injústis, ut nos offérret Deo, mortificátus quidem carne, vivificátus autem spíritu. In quo et his, qui in cárcere erant, spirítibus véniens prædicávit: qui incréduli fúerant aliquándo, quando exspectábant Dei patiéntiam in diébus Noë, cum fabricarétur arca, in qua pauci, id est octo ánimæ salvæ factæ sunt per aquam. Quod et vos nunc símilis formæ salvos facit baptísma: non carnis deposítio sórdium, sed consciéntiæ bonæ interrogátio in Deum per resurrectiónem Jesu Christi, Dómini nostri, qui est in dextera Dei.
proper_latin.label: Lectio

proper_latin.body:
Allelúja, allelúja.
*Ps 117:24; 117:26-27*
Hæc dies, quam fecit Dóminus: exsultémus et lætémur in ea.
V. Benedíctus, qui venit in nómine Dómini: Deus Dóminus, et illúxit nobis. Allelúja, allelúja.
*Ps 95:10*
Dícite in géntibus: quia Dóminus regnávit a ligno.
proper_latin.label: Graduale

proper_latin.body:
Víctimæ pascháli laudes ímmolent Christiáni.
Agnus rédemit oves: Christus ínnocens Patri reconciliávit peccatóres.
Mors et vita duéllo conflixére mirándo: dux vitæ mórtuus regnat vivus.
Dic nobis, María, quid vidísti in via?
Sepúlcrum Christi vivéntis et glóriam vidi resurgéntis.
Angélicos testes, sudárium et vestes.
Surréxit Christus, spes mea: præcédet vos in Galilǽam.
Scimus Christum surrexísse a mórtuis vere: tu nobis, victor Rex, miserére. Amen. Allelúja.
*Sequentia dicitur usque ad Sabbatum in Albis inclusive.*
proper_latin.label: Sequentia

proper_latin.body:
Sequéntia ☩ sancti Evangélii secúndum Matthǽum.
*Matt 28:16-20*
In illo témpore: Undecim discípuli abiérunt in Galilǽam, in montem, ubi constitúerat illis Jesus. Et vidéntes eum adoravérunt: quidam autem dubitavérunt. Et accédens Jesus locútus est eis, dicens: Data est mihi omnis potéstas in cœlo et in terra. Eúntes ergo, docéte omnes gentes, baptizántes eos in nómine Patris, et Fílii, et Spíritus Sancti: docentes eos serváre ómnia, quæcúmque mandávi vobis. Et ecce, ego vobíscum sum ómnibus diébus usque ad consummatiónem sǽculi.
proper_latin.label: Evangelium

proper_latin.body:
*Exod 12:14*
Erit vobis hæc dies memoriális, allelúja: et diem festum celebrábitis sollémnem Dómino in progénies vestras: legítimum sempitérnum diem, allelúja, allelúja, allelúja.
proper_latin.label: Offertorium

proper_latin.body:
Hóstias, quǽsumus, Dómine, placátus assúme: quas et pro renatórum expiatióne peccáti deférimus, et pro acceleratióne cœléstis auxílii.
Per Dominum...
proper_latin.label: Secreta

proper_latin.body:
*Paschalis*
Vere dignum et justum est, æquum et salutáre: Te quidem, Dómine, omni témpore, sed in hoc potíssimum (sed tempore Passionis)
hac potíssimum nocte (sed octava Paschæ)
hac potíssimum die gloriósius prædicáre, cum Pascha nostrum immolátus est Christus. Ipse enim verus est Agnus, qui ábstulit peccáta mundi. Qui mortem nostram moriéndo destrúxit et vitam resurgéndo reparávit. Et ídeo cum Angelis et Archángelis, cum Thronis et Dominatiónibus cumque omni milítia coeléstis exércitus hymnum glóriæ tuæ cánimus, sine fine dicéntes:
proper_latin.label: Prefatio

proper_latin.body:
*Matt 28:18-19*
Data est mihi omnis potéstas in cœlo et in terra, allelúja: eúntes, docéte omnes gentes, baptizántes eos in nómine Patris, et Fílii, et Spíritus Sancti, allelúja, allelúja.
proper_latin.label: Communio

proper_latin.body:
Réspice, quǽsumus, Dómine, pópulum tuum: et, quem ætérnis dignátus es renováre mystériis, a temporálibus culpis dignánter absólve.
Per Dominum...
proper_latin.label: Postcommunio

proper_vernacular.body:
*Sl 77:53*
And he brought them out in hope, and they feared not: and the sea overwhelmed their enemies, allel�ja, allel�ja, allel�ja.
*Sl 77:1*
Attend, O my people, to my law: incline your ears to the words of my mouth.
Glória ao Pai.
And he brought them out in hope, and they feared not: and the sea overwhelmed their enemies, allel�ja, allel�ja, allel�ja.
proper_vernacular.label: Intróito

proper_vernacular.body:
Almighty and eternal God, in the Easter sacrament thou instituted the covenant, whereby thou forgavest mankind; grant to our souls, that what we outwardly profess we may show forth in our deeds.
Por nosso Senhor...
proper_vernacular.label: Oração

proper_vernacular.body:
Lesson from the first letter of St. Peter the Apostle
*1 Pet 3:18-22*
Beloved: Christ also died once for our sins, the just for the unjust: that he might offer us to God, being put to death indeed in the flesh, but enlivened in the spirit, In which also coming he preached to those spirits that were in prison: Which had been some time incredulous, when they waited for the patience of God in the days of Noe, when the ark was a building: wherein a few, that is, eight souls, were saved by water. Whereunto baptism being of the like form, now saveth you also: not the putting away of the filth of the flesh, but the examination of a good conscience towards God by the resurrection of Jesus Christ. Who is on the right hand of God, swallowing down death, that we might be made heirs of life everlasting: being gone into heaven, the angels and powers and virtues being made subject to him.
proper_vernacular.label: Epístola

proper_vernacular.body:
Alleluia, alleluia
*Sl 117:24; 117:26-27*
This is the day which the Lord hath made: let us be glad and rejoice therein. Blessed be he that cometh in the name Lord. The Lord is God, and he hath shone upon us. Allel�ja, allel�ja.
*Sl 95:10*
Say ye among the Gentiles, the Lord hath reigned from a tree.
proper_vernacular.label: Gradual

proper_vernacular.body:
Christians! to the Paschal Victim offer your thankful praises.
The Lamb the sheep redeemeth: Christ, who only is sinless, reconcileth sinners to the Father.
Death and life contended in that conflict stupendous: the Prince of Life, who died, deathless reigneth.
Speak, Mary, declaring what thou sawest wayfaring.
"The tomb of Christ who now liveth: and likewise the glory of the Risen.
Bright Angels attesting, the shroud and napkin resting.
Yea, Christ my hope is arisen: to Galilee He goeth before you."
We know that Christ is risen, henceforth ever living: Have mercy, Victor King, pardon giving. Amen. Alleluia.
proper_vernacular.label: Sequência

proper_vernacular.body:
Continuation ☩ of the Holy Gospel according to Matthew
*Mt 28:16-20*
In that time:  the eleven disciples went into Galilee, unto the mountain where Jesus had appointed them. And seeing Him they adored: but some doubted. And Jesus coming, spoke to them, saying: All power is given to me in heaven and in earth. Going therefore, teach ye all nations; baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost. Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and behold I am with you all days, even to the consummation of the world.
proper_vernacular.label: Evangelho

proper_vernacular.body:
*Exod 12:14*
And this day shall be for a memorial to you: and you shall keep it a feast to the Lord in your generations with an everlasting observance, allel�ja, allel�ja, allel�ja.
proper_vernacular.label: Ofertório

proper_vernacular.body:
In thy forgiving mercy, O Lord we pray, accept the sacrifice which we offer, to atone for the sins of those who are born anew and to hasten the giving of thy hevenly help.
Por nosso Senhor...
proper_vernacular.label: Secreta

proper_vernacular.body:
*da Páscoa*
É verdadeiramente digno e justo, racional e salutar, que Vos louvemos sempre, mas principalmente... em que Jesus Cristo foi imolado, como nova Páscoa. Pois Ele é o verdadeiro Cordeiro que tirou os pecados do mundo e que pela sua Ressurreição nos restituiu a vida. Por isso, com os Anjos e Arcanjos, com os Tronos e Dominações e com toda a milícia do exército celestial, cantamos o hino da vossa glória, dizendo incessantemente:
proper_vernacular.label: Prefácio

proper_vernacular.body:
*Mt 28:18-19*
All power is given to me in heaven and in earth. Going therefore, teach ye all nations; baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost, allel�ja, allel�ja.
proper_vernacular.label: Comúnio

proper_vernacular.body:
O Lord, we beseech thee, behold thy people, and as thou hast decided to quicken them with the mysteries of eternity, mercifully free them from the sins committed in time.
Por nosso Senhor...
proper_vernacular.label: Postcomúnio
